 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּעַ‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il**<sub>40</sub> 

**1.** ==raise a shout==. 

**2.** ==give a blast with clarion or horn== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***utter a grumbling cry***); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵרִיעוּ‎</span> [[Judg.15.14|Judg 15:14]]; [[Ezra.3.11|Ezra 3:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵרֵעוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.17.20|1Sam 17:20]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרִיעַ‎</span> [[Isa.42.13|Isa 42:13]]; [[Ps.41.12|Ps 41:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫רַע‎</span> [[Josh.6.20|Josh 6:20]], etc.; ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִיעִי‎</span> [[Zech.9.9|Zech 9:9]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִיעוּ‎</span> [[Josh.6.10|Josh 6:10]] +; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִיעַ‎</span> [[2Chr.13.12|2Chr 13:12]]; [[2Chr.13.15|2Chr 13:15]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִיעִים‎</span> [[Ezra.3.13|Ezra 3:13]] — 

**1.** ***shout a war-cry***, or ***alarm of battle***, [[Josh.6.10|Josh 6:10]] (3 t. in verse); [[Josh.6.16|Josh 6:16]]; [[Josh.6.20|Josh 6:20]]; [[Judg.7.21|Judg 7:21]]; [[1Sam.17.52|1Sam 17:52]]; [[Isa.42.13|Isa 42:13]]; [[2Chr.13.15|2Chr 13:15]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הריע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּרוּעָה‎</span> [[Josh.6.5|Josh 6:5]]; [[Josh.6.20|Josh 6:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקראת‎</span> [[Judg.15.14|Judg 15:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמִּלְחָמָה‎</span> [[1Sam.17.20|1Sam 17:20]]. 

**2.** ***sound a signal for war*** or ***march:*** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲצֹצְרוֺת‎</span> [[Num.10.7|Num 10:7]]; [[Num.10.9|Num 10:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תקע שׁוֺפָר‎</span> [[Hos.5.8|Hos 5:8]], compare [[Joel.2.1|Joel 2:1]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> ***against*** [[2Chr.13.12|2Chr 13:12]] so also probably [[Job.30.5|Job 30:5]] (against a thief). 

**3.** ***shout in triumph*** over enemies: with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>, [[Jer.50.15|Jer 50:15]]; [[Ps.41.12|Ps 41:12]] absolute [[Zeph.3.14|Zeph 3:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רנן‎</span>). 

**4.** ***shout in applause:*** absolute [[1Sam.10.24|1Sam 10:24]]; [[Zech.9.9|Zech 9:9]], compare (of angels) [[Job.38.7|Job 38:7]]. 

**5.** ***shout*** with religious impulse: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּרוּעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הר‎</span> [[1Sam.4.5|1Sam 4:5]]; [[Ezra.3.11|Ezra 3:11]]; [[Ezra.3.13|Ezra 3:13]] so in public worship with music and sacrifice, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, to God [[Ps.47.2|Ps 47:2]]; [[Ps.66.1|Ps 66:1]]; [[Ps.81.2|Ps 81:2]]; [[Ps.95.1|Ps 95:1]]; [[Ps.95.2|Ps 95:2]]; [[Ps.98.4|Ps 98:4]]; [[Ps.100.1|Ps 100:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לפני‎</span> [[Ps.98.6|Ps 98:6]] in joy, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתִּיּוֺת אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Isa.44.23|Isa 44:23]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָנּוּ שָׁמַיִם‎</span>). 

**6.** ***cry out in distress***, [[Isa.15.4|Isa 15:4]] (but [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָָֽרְעוּ‎</span> ***tremble***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָמָּה תָרִיעִי רֵ֑עַ‎</span> [[Mic.4.9|Mic 4:9]] (of Zion under figure of woman, but perhaps read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎למה תָּרוֺעִי רֹעַ‎</span> ***why art thou broken all to pieces?*** as [[Prov.11.15|Prov 11:15]]). **Po\`lal.** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular impersonal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יְרֹעָ֑ע‎</span> [[Isa.16.10|Isa 16:10]] ***a shout shall not be uttered*** (of joy in harvest; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרֻנָּן‎</span>). **Hithpo\`lel** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתְרוֺעָ֑ע‎</span> [[Ps.108.10|Ps 108:10]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְרוֺעֲעוּ‎</span> [[Ps.65.14|Ps 65:14]] ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְרוֺעָ֑עִי‎</span> [[Ps.60.10|Ps 60:10]] — 

**1.** ***shout in triumph:*** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> [[Ps.60.10|Ps 60:10]] (subject Philistia; iron.) \|\| [[Ps.108.10|Ps 108:10]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>). 

**2.** ***shout for joy***, [[Ps.65.14|Ps 65:14]] (meadows, valleys; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁיר‎</span>).
